message.name: ERR_ATTENDANCEPAYMENT_FV_EFFECTIVE_DATE_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: The Effective Date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_ATTENDANCEPAYMENT_FV_ATTENDANCEPAYMENT_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: The Attendance Based Payment Frequency must be entered.

message.name: ERR_ATTENDANCEPAYMENT_FV_ALREADY_PAYMENT_EXISTS_NOT_TO_CREATE
message.locale: A payment has been made for the Effective Date, %1d, the configuration cannot be created.

message.name: ERR_ATTENDANCEPAYMENT_FV_ALREADY_PAYMENT_EXISTS_NOT_TO_UPDATE
message.locale: A payment has been made for the Effective Date, %1d, the configuration cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_ATTENDANCEPAYMENT_FV_ALREADY_PAYMENT_EXISTS_NOT_TO_CANCEL
message.locale: A payment has been made for the Effective Date, %1d, the configuration cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_ATTENDANCEPAYMENTFREQUENCY_FV_RECORD_ALREADY_CANCELLED
message.locale: This attendance payment frequency is already deleted.
